channel.title: Networking on My Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Networking on My Wiki

item.title: How Does DNS Work?
item.description: Introduction # Here’s what I did for hosting my website on GitHub Pages using a custom domain. I’ll think about self hosting using a web server on a VPS later. Go ahead and purchase a domain from a registrar which offers decent purchase as well as renewal prices on domains. Choose a top-level domain (TLD) which doesn’t restrict WHOIS privacy and has DNSSEC. The .com TLD fulfills these criteria but the .
